a square of thick soft paper or cloth that is fastened around a baby's bottom and between its legs to absorb its urine and solid waste: disposable/reusable diapers diaper creamchange someone's diaper She was changing the baby's diaper.in diapers I knew William when he was still in diapers (= when he was a baby).
